blog.name: tobobio
blog.title: Bakubros
blog.description: i write Bakugou x reader scenarios. Ask box: CLOSED I try to post everyday. Art blog: momobuta

title: BakuBirthday Special [ideas]
body:
so as most of yall may know Bakugou’s birthday is coming up so I have a few ideas of what im going to post or what i may do. im pretty bedridden so i have time to do a lot. 

1. im thinking of opening the ask box for requests (that is if i get the last remaining requests knocked out today and tomorrow)

2. for those who read His Tyranny, I’m posting a long and lengthy chapter 21 so look forward to that! because even while im writing it im on edge. its a good chapter hehe. ALSO i will post a special bonus chapter of his tyranny, its not really a chapter that develops the story but like a little fluff chapter that happens during Bakugou and readers free times in the castle (pretty much untold events that happened within readers stay with bakubro.)

3. i want to put out a special little story i thought of while i was on my month hiatus. its some fluffly domestic bakugou. some good shit.

4. regarding Drunken Times. I plan on releasing at least one more chapter for that. it would make it the 10th and possibly final chapter for that little one-shot scenario series. 

5. I will try to post of baku-art on my art blog here

i think i will make this a 3 day thing. so from April 20-23

what are your opinions? what should i post? 

WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING FORWARD TO?

LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK

hehe enjoy.

summary: "If we see everything with our eyes and our eyes see light and light is made up of colors and the colors form the 🌈 and the 🌈 is...
body:
“If we see everything with our eyes and our eyes see light and light is made up of colors and the colors form the 🌈 and the 🌈 is gay therefore EVERYTHING IS G A Y but thats just a theory a GAY theory”

I really liked this meme it made me imagine deku just going into deep thought and sticking rainbow stickers on kirishima’s and momo’s faces when it says “and our eyes see light” since the both of them radiate sunshine.

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: the demons that are class 1-a
description:
by elliethewerewolf

Iida and Yaoyorozu decided to create a group chat for the class. Everyone knows how that’s going to go.
Aizawa learns his class are literal demons that he cares about, even if he won’t admit it.
Class 1-A terrorize everyone in the vicinity.

Just your average chatfic.

Words: 1533, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: tobobio
blog.title: Bakubros
blog.description: i write Bakugou x reader scenarios. Ask box: CLOSED I try to post everyday. Art blog: momobuta

summary: Could you do one where bakugou is basically reacting to the fact that his s/o likes to listen to music when they’re “having fun”...
question: Could you do one where bakugou is basically reacting to the fact that his s/o likes to listen to music when they’re “having fun” because she doesn’t like to listen to herself as well as one of their classmates telling her they know when her and bakugou are being intimate because of the loud music that blasts through the dorms
answer:
i plan on getting at least one or two more requests out today.

hope you enjoy!

“Why do you always blast that shit?” your ash blonde lover asked you, obviously frustrated that you interrupted your heated make out session to play some music.

Your already flushed cheeks grew hotter with embarrassment. You were ashamed to explain the reasoning behind the action due to a recent incident with a classmate eavesdropping on one of you and your boyfriends “sessions”. Well you two weren’t exactly being quiet.

“W-well… it’s just so no one will hear us…” you mumbled, looking away from the blonde as you chose a playlist on your phone. “Momo kinda heard us a few nights ago… and the noises I make are so embarrassing…”

Bakugou clicked his tongue, “Bullshit. I don’t give a fuck if they hear us-”

“Well I do ok! Do you know how embarrassed I was when she told me!” your face burned red at the memory. “She heard everything! I probably sound so weird!- ah!” a firm smack was landed on your ass and you turned to pout at your boyfriend only to be met with his usual shit eating smirk.

“Fuck that. Make as many noises as you want, I love the sounds you make babe.” once you hit play on a song, he grabbed your arm pulling you body back flush against his. His mouth nibbling at the skin of your neck, dragging out soft moans from your lips.

“Now where were we~”

—

The next day when you walked into the classroom, you felt an unnerving large amount of eyes on you and the ash blonde. You brushed it off, deeming it was nothing and that you were just imagining things. Until the group of girls in your class approached you.

“U-um good morning (y/n)-chan” Uraraka greeted you, her cheeks much pinker than usual.

“Good morning, are you ok Ochako? Your face is a bit red?”

You noticed the other girls also looked a bit feverish. And almost… nervous?

“Uh- yeah I’m fine! It’s just that… um your music last night… it was a bit loud…”

Your face paled. “Oh! Uh, sorry about that.” you grew nervous, had you been found out? “I’ll turn it down next time.”

A snicker was heard from one of the girls. You saw the sleeves of a particular invisible girl bent up in a motion that told she was covering her mouth.

“(y/n)-chan and Bakugou-kun must’ve been having fun last night~”

The blood that drained from your face rose like a thermometer as well as your body temperature. Oh boy, not again.

“T-toru! It was nothing!- We weren’t!-”  

“No need to hide it (y/n)-chan, we all know you and Bakugou are getting down and dirty when you turn your music on. Trying to hide those cute noises you make huh? (y/n)-chan~”

Your face was on fire now, you opened your mouth to come up with an excuse but failed as your words struggled to come out. “I-I-I-”

You wanted nothing more than to run away and hide in a hole forever. Looking past the girls, in search for your blonde boyfriend, you could see the male members of the Bakusquad teasing your lover. Giving him playful shoves with a red faced Bakugou yelling back at them, knowing exactly what they would be teasing him about.

God you weren’t gonna hear the end of this.

“No need to be shy (y/n)-chan, you can tell us all about it! So how is blasty boy in bed? Does he make you explode?”

Oh you wanted to die.

“Please shut up!!!”

“U-um good morning (y/n)-chan” Uraraka greeted you, her cheeks much pinker than usual.

“Good morning, are you ok Ochako? Your face is a bit red?”

You noticed the other girls also looked a bit feverish. And almost… nervous?

“Uh- yeah I’m fine! It’s just that… um your music last night… it was a bit loud…”

Your face paled. “Oh! Uh, sorry about that.” you grew nervous, had you been found out? “I’ll turn it down next time.”

A snicker was heard from one of the girls. You saw the sleeves of a particular invisible girl bent up in a motion that told she was covering her mouth.

“(y/n)-chan and Bakugou-kun must’ve been having fun last night~”

The blood that drained from your face rose like a thermometer as well as your body temperature. Oh boy, not again.

“T-toru! It was nothing!- We weren’t!-”  

“No need to hide it (y/n)-chan, we all know you and Bakugou are getting down and dirty when you turn your music on. Trying to hide those cute noises you make huh? (y/n)-chan~”

Your face was on fire now, you opened your mouth to come up with an excuse but failed as your words struggled to come out. “I-I-I-”

You wanted nothing more than to run away and hide in a hole forever. Looking past the girls, in search for your blonde boyfriend, you could see the male members of the Bakusquad teasing your lover. Giving him playful shoves with a red faced Bakugou yelling back at them, knowing exactly what they would be teasing him about.

God you weren’t gonna hear the end of this.

“No need to be shy (y/n)-chan, you can tell us all about it! So how is blasty boy in bed? Does he make you explode?”

Oh you wanted to die.

“Please shut up!!!”

trail.content_raw:
i plan on getting at least one or two more requests out today.

hope you enjoy!

“Why do you always blast that shit?” your ash blonde lover asked you, obviously frustrated that you interrupted your heated make out session to play some music.

Your already flushed cheeks grew hotter with embarrassment. You were ashamed to explain the reasoning behind the action due to a recent incident with a classmate eavesdropping on one of you and your boyfriends “sessions”. Well you two weren’t exactly being quiet.

“W-well… it’s just so no one will hear us…” you mumbled, looking away from the blonde as you chose a playlist on your phone. “Momo kinda heard us a few nights ago… and the noises I make are so embarrassing…”

Bakugou clicked his tongue, “Bullshit. I don’t give a fuck if they hear us-”

“Well I do ok! Do you know how embarrassed I was when she told me!” your face burned red at the memory. “She heard everything! I probably sound so weird!- ah!” a firm smack was landed on your ass and you turned to pout at your boyfriend only to be met with his usual shit eating smirk.

“Fuck that. Make as many noises as you want, I love the sounds you make babe.” once you hit play on a song, he grabbed your arm pulling you body back flush against his. His mouth nibbling at the skin of your neck, dragging out soft moans from your lips.

“Now where were we~”

—

The next day when you walked into the classroom, you felt an unnerving large amount of eyes on you and the ash blonde. You brushed it off, deeming it was nothing and that you were just imagining things. Until the group of girls in your class approached you.

“U-um good morning (y/n)-chan” Uraraka greeted you, her cheeks much pinker than usual.

“Good morning, are you ok Ochako? Your face is a bit red?”

You noticed the other girls also looked a bit feverish. And almost… nervous?

“Uh- yeah I’m fine! It’s just that… um your music last night… it was a bit loud…”

Your face paled. “Oh! Uh, sorry about that.” you grew nervous, had you been found out? “I’ll turn it down next time.”

A snicker was heard from one of the girls. You saw the sleeves of a particular invisible girl bent up in a motion that told she was covering her mouth.

“(y/n)-chan and Bakugou-kun must’ve been having fun last night~”

The blood that drained from your face rose like a thermometer as well as your body temperature. Oh boy, not again.

“T-toru! It was nothing!- We weren’t!-”  

“No need to hide it (y/n)-chan, we all know you and Bakugou are getting down and dirty when you turn your music on. Trying to hide those cute noises you make huh? (y/n)-chan~”

Your face was on fire now, you opened your mouth to come up with an excuse but failed as your words struggled to come out. “I-I-I-”

You wanted nothing more than to run away and hide in a hole forever. Looking past the girls, in search for your blonde boyfriend, you could see the male members of the Bakusquad teasing your lover. Giving him playful shoves with a red faced Bakugou yelling back at them, knowing exactly what they would be teasing him about.

God you weren’t gonna hear the end of this.

“No need to be shy (y/n)-chan, you can tell us all about it! So how is blasty boy in bed? Does he make you explode?”

Oh you wanted to die.

“Please shut up!!!”

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Memory Remedy
description:
by ErrorTryAgain

Izuku Midoriya wakes up with a hungover, claiming that he’s someone named Shouto Todoroki, and that he has a wife named, Momo Todoroki, someone no one has met before, but that doesn’t stop him from thinking about her.

And looks like his ex-husband, Katsuki Bakugou, isn’t exactly happy about it.

—–
Izuku stood up, cleaning himself in the process, “Okay, okay,” the greenette made movements as if he’s pushing something, “I should’ve introduced myself first, I’m Shouto Todoroki.” Eijirou’s eyes blew wide.

“Huh? Bro, we only went drinking yesterday, we definitely didn’t get your name changed.” Eijirou put his hands up, gesturing the greenette to calm down.

Words: 1490, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated

  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Yaoyorozu Momo, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto/Yaoyorozu Momo, Kirishima Eijirou & Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Uraraka Ochako, Midoriya Izuku & Yaoyorozu Momo

title: Always Together
description:
by EffyBeat

They met in an accident.

Some naive and inexperienced villain had thought tormenting middle schoolers to get some easy cash was something he could get away with.

That was something more than easy to deal with for him. So easy, in fact, he almost thought it had to be more complicated. And Bakugou was right, only not the way he expected. Funny story to meet your best friend.

Kiribaku week 2k19
Vigilante au/Scars/Children
